thread.title: Alesha Dixon wowed guests at the Hard Rock Pinktober Gala
thread.title_full: Alesha Dixon wowed guests at the Hard Rock Pinktober Gala

title: Alesha Dixon wowed guests at the Hard Rock Pinktober Gala
text:
Alesha Dixon wowed guests at the Hard Rock Pinktober Gala Alesha Dixon wowed guests at the Hard Rock Pinktober Gala 
Press Association 2014 / / National Entertainment News Share 
Alesha Dixon took to the stage at the Pinktober Gala performing her new single Tallest Girl from the album Do It For Love. 
The Britain’s Got Talent judge was smartly dressed in head to toe black – with an on-trend crop top and high-waisted trousers – for the event at The Dorchester Hotel in central London. 
She also treated guests to a performance of The Boy Does Nothing plus a selection of her other top hits. (Ian West/PA) 
Pinktober, in association with Hard Rock, is supporting the work of The Caron Keating Foundation, a charity set up in memory of the former TV presenter. 
Alesha joined Caron’s mother, the TV personality Gloria Hunniford, to help spread the message about Pinktober. (Ian West/PA) 
Other guests included actor and television presenter Christopher Biggins and radio host Nick Ferrari. Share article 
Since 2008, the gala has raised more than £500,000 for The Caron Keating Foundation. Other Pinktober events take place around the world backed by Hard Rock. Promoted Stories
